bug.short_desc: VirtualSelectBox demands model items to have label information in a property when using the bindItem delegate

long_desc.thetext:
spending several hours to solve the following problem: * Bind a qx.data.Array to VirtualSelectBox * Each item in this array was a qx.core.Object implementing a mixin with a method named: "get_label". (Notice the underscore to avoid conflicts with property getters).
Because items in this list are heterogeneous. I couldn't rely on one property for label information. Therefore I created the get_label method.
To bind the list model with the select box I used a delegate to configure the binding for each item. This however resulted in an error. After hours of debugging I finally found the solution in the source code of the widget. It seems that the delegate "bindItem" function is only used for items in the virtual list, not the atom child control.
Now I solved it by using the converter label option (http://tinyurl.com/d47c4mw).
For the record: * Can we make the atom child control use single value binding or something? * If not, should we add some documentation about this, so others won't stumble like I did.
